source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    Site.SiteId
	,Site.SiteName
	,Profiles.Pro_code AS profile_code
    ,Profiles.Prodesc AS profile_description
    ,Chsysdec.Description AS account_type
    ,Profiles.Pro_ref
    ,Profiles.Billdays AS bill_days_or_nights
    ,Profiles.Billdeath AS bill_day_of_death
    ,Profiles.Billdod AS bill_day_of_discharge
    ,Profiles.Billdoa AS bill_day_of_admission
    ,Profiles.Invprint
    ,Profiles.Invdoc
    ,Profiles.Soflag AS standing_order
    ,Profiles.Noticeper AS notice_period
    ,Profiles.Nperanal AS notice_period_analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Npervatr AS notice_period_vat_code
    ,Profiles.Defrate AS default_charge_rate
    ,Profiles.Chgper AS charge_period
    ,Profiles.Feesanal AS analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Feesdesc AS fees_description
    ,Profiles.FeesVatC AS vat_code
    ,Profiles.BillAbs AS bill_while_temp_absent
    ,Profiles.Autocredit AS automatic_credit
    ,Profiles.PenBooks AS attach_pension_books
    ,Profiles.UserMemo
    ,Profiles.NoInvDec
    ,Profiles.sg_BankAcc
    ,Profiles.UseFlag
    ,Profiles.OOSExtraContrib

FROM 
	Profiles (NOLOCK)

    JOIN Chsysdec (NOLOCK) -- Lookup table for values?
        ON Chsysdec.Decode_Ref = Profiles.FsType

    JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Profiles.Pro_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'PROFILES'
                            )
           OR Profiles.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Profiles.FSTYPE = 401 --Local Auth
	AND Site.SITEID IN (
	071,
072,
073,
074,
075,
078,
079,
086,
089,
088,
091,
092,
090,
095,
096,
097,
098,
099,
100,
101,
102,
103,
104,
105,
106,
107,
108,
109,
110,
111,
112,
113,
114,
115,
116,
117,
118,
119,
120,
121,
122,
123,
127,
128
)

SELECT 
    H.Home_Ref
    --,P.SiteId
    ,SiteName
    ,profile_code
    ,profile_description
    ,account_type
    ,Pro_ref
    ,bill_days_or_nights
    ,bill_day_of_death
    ,bill_day_of_discharge
    ,bill_day_of_admission
    --,Invprint
    --,Invdoc
    ,standing_order
    ,notice_period
    ,notice_period_analysis_code
    ,notice_period_vat_code
    ,default_charge_rate
    ,charge_period
    ,analysis_code
    ,fees_description
    ,vat_code
    ,bill_while_temp_absent
    ,automatic_credit
    ,attach_pension_books
    --,UserMemo
    --,NoInvDec
    ,sg_BankAcc
    --,UseFlag
    --,OOSExtraContrib
FROM 
    dbo.LocalAuthProfiles AS P

    LEFT JOIN ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = P.SiteId

SELECT DISTINCT
    Site.SiteName
    ,Site.SiteId
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_code AS calendar_code
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_desc as calendar_description
    ,DECGrouping.Description AS calendar_grouping
    ,Calendar_Hd.Invdtoff
    ,Calendar_Hd.Invdttype
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldStartDt AS calendar_start_date
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldEndDt AS calendar_end_date
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldFreq AS frequency
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldDays AS no_of_days
    ,Calendar_Hd.ProcFlag
    ,Calendar_Hd.SiteFilter
    ,Calendar_Hd.Sched_Only
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoProc
    ,Calendar_Hd.ProcOffset
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoProcWarn
    ,Calendar_Hd.InvOffset
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoInvWarn
    ,Calendar_Dt.StartDate AS period_start_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.EndDate AS period_end_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.BillDate AS period_bill_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.SSProcessDate
    ,Calendar_Dt.SSInvoiceDate
FROM 
	Calendar_Hd (NOLOCK)
    
	JOIN ChSysDec AS DECGrouping (NOLOCK)
        ON DECGrouping.Decode_Ref = Calendar_Hd.Grouping
    
	JOIN Calendar_Dt (NOLOCK)
        ON Calendar_Dt.Cal_Ref = Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
    
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'CALENDAR_HD'
                            )
           OR Calendar_Hd.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Calendar_Hd.Cal_Code
    BETWEEN '      ' AND 'ZZZZZZ'
    AND Calendar_Dt.StartDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
    AND Calendar_Dt.EndDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
    AND (
            Calendar_Dt.BillDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
            OR Calendar_Dt.BillDate IS NULL
        )
    AND Site.SITEID IN (
	071,
	072,
	073,
	074,
	075,
	078,
	079,
	086,
	089,
	088,
	091,
	092,
	090,
	095,
	096,
	097,
	098,
	099,
	100,
	101,
	102,
	103,
	104,
	105,
	106,
	107,
	108,
	109,
	110,
	111,
	112,
	113,
	114,
	115,
	116,
	117,
	118,
	119,
	120,
	121,
	122,
	123,
	127,
	128
	)
ORDER BY 
	Calendar_Hd.Cal_code

SELECT 
    H.HOME_REF
    ,SiteName
    --,Cal.SiteId
    ,Cal_Ref
    ,calendar_code
    ,calendar_description
    ,calendar_grouping
    --,Invdtoff
    --,Invdttype
    ,calendar_start_date
    ,calendar_end_date
    ,frequency
    ,no_of_days
    ,ProcFlag
    ,SiteFilter
    ,Sched_Only
    --,AutoProc
    --,ProcOffset
    --,AutoProcWarn
    --,InvOffset
    --,AutoInvWarn
    ,period_start_date
    ,period_end_date
    ,period_bill_date
    ,SSProcessDate
    ,SSInvoiceDate
FROM 
    dbo.Calendars AS Cal

    LEFT JOIN dbo.ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = Cal.SiteID

properties.description: Runs pipelines to copy files from file share, then process them into SQL tables.
Copies the Parquet files from the Azure file share to Azure blob storage. Then copies data from the files and loads into the TRANSFROM_DB

activities.name: Download bak files from FTP
activities.description: Download the zipped bak files from FTP

activities.name: Copy Bak files to Fileshare Failure
Download bak files from FTP Failure
Transfer File to Blob Storage
activities.description: Copies the file generated on the VM from the file share to container in Blob Storage

activities.name: Load CSV file to DB table
activities.description: Inserts the records in the csv file to the Avery DB on AH2

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')}))

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(RES_FNAME, 1, CHARINDEX(' ', RES_FNAME + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

properties.description: Copies Homes table from AH1 to AH2 and also updates HomesID's in TRANSFORM_DB Avery.HomeID

activities.name: Update HomeID table
activities.description: Updates Avery.HomeDetails table in the TRANSFORM_DB with latest data

properties.description: Pipeline to update Pricing tables outside GRG refresh Window

activities.name: Upsert Coldharbour Rooms
activities.description: Updates the ColdHarbour.Rooms table from the Polestar DB. Polestar DB is a replication of the GRG database (CH reporting suite/DB)

activities.name: Copy Employee JSON Data to SQL
activities.description: Copies data from the JSON file exported from the API to the Softworks.Employee_JSON table. All stored as String data.

activities.name: Upsert to Tables
activities.description: Upsert data from Softworks.Employee_JSON table to the Softworks.Employee table, converting several of the data types in the process. Uses the EmployeeNumber as the Key Field.

dependsOn.activity: Copy Employee JSON Data to SQL

activities.name: Copy Clockings JSON data to SQL

dependsOn.activity: Copy Clockings JSON data to SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT	 
	'@{variables('Home_Ref')}' AS HOME_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	RESIDENT.RES_CODE as resident_no,
	InvPosting.account_No, 
	InvPosting.Cre_DateT AS created_date, 
	InvPosting.Inv_Date AS transaction_date,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		ELSE ''
	END AS transaction_type,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS transaction_ref1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS transaction_ref2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS transaction_value, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS transaction_balance, 
	Memo,
	USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM		 
	InvPosting (NOLOCK) 
	
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK) 
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT (NOLOCK)
		ON RESIDENT.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF
WHERE	
	InvPosting.Site_Ref  = '@{variables('SITE_REF')}'
SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, SITE_REF FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

properties.description: Extracts data Yardi require to single csv files for multiple homes

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    AmendDateTime,
    CreateDateTime,
    HOME_REF,
    OLOC_REF,
    OROOM_REF,
    ROOM_CAT,
    ROOM_CAT_DESC,
    ROOM_CODE,
    ROOM_DESC,
    ROOM_NO_BEDS,
    ROOM_REF,
    ROOM_TYPE,
    ROOM_TYPE_DESC,
    CHARGEPERIOD,
    CURRENTRATE,
    RATEDATE,
    ROOM_UDF1,
    ROOM_UDF2,
    ROOM_UDF3,
    ROOM_UDF4,
    USEFLAG
FROM 
    dbo.ROOMS
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
    ,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN CHARINDEX(' and ', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME LIKE ' %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN LTRIM(RES_FNAME)
        WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) LIKE '% %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(LTRIM(RES_FNAME), 1, CHARINDEX(' ', LTRIM(RES_FNAME) + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,CASE 
        WHEN LTRIM(RES_SNAME) = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
        ELSE LTRIM(RES_SNAME)
    END AS RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,CASE 
        WHEN Forenames = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN Forenames = '*' THEN ''
        else Forenames
    END AS Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,CASE 
        WHEN Surname = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN Surname = '*' THEN ''
        else Surname
    END AS Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')}))

SELECT 
    ACTDEATHDT
    ,ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,AD_REF
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CAUSE
    ,CAUSEDEATH
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DATE
    ,DISCHDECEAS
    ,DISDEST
    ,DISREASON
    ,DISTYPE
    ,DOCTOR
    ,FINALDISCH
    ,HOME_REF
    ,INITIALADM
    ,INOUT
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MOVE_REF
    ,PLACE
    ,REASON
    ,RES_REF
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,TIME
    ,MOVE_TIME
    ,ANALCHANGE
    ,COMPOSITE
    ,MOVESUB_REF
    ,PREVDISDEST
    ,PREVDISTYPE
FROM 
    dbo.ADMIN_DISCHARGE
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT
    ACCNO
    ,ACCSUFFIX
    ,ACCTYPE
    ,ACCTYPE2
    ,ACCTYPE_DECODE
    ,ACC_REF
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CALENDAR
    ,CAL_REF
    ,CHGPER
    ,Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Cont_Ref
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DAILYRATE
    ,ENDDATE
    ,FINALINV
    ,FS_REF
    ,FUNDSOURCE
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTRATEDT
    ,ORIGREF
    ,PENSBOOK
    ,PROFILE
    ,RATE
    ,RECGRP
    ,RECGRPDESC
    ,RELACCREF
    ,RES_REF
    ,RecType
    ,STARTDATE
    ,SUFFIXSUPERCEDED
    ,ANAL3
    ,ATTENTION
    ,AUTHORISED
    ,CONSULTANT
    ,CRCONTROL
    ,DEBTORCODE
    ,FUNDREQEDI
    ,FURC_DEC
    ,INPFUNDAPR
    ,LOCALITY
    ,NURFUNDAPR
    ,RECONCILED
    ,BANKACC
    ,BANKACCNAME
    ,BANKADDRESS1
    ,BANKADDRESS2
    ,BANKADDRESS3
    ,BANKADDRESS4
    ,BANKNAME
    ,BANKPOSTCODE
    ,BANKSORTCODE
    ,BANKSTREF
    ,BANKTRTYPE
    ,DDMANDREF
    ,SOCOLDAY
    ,SOCOLLECT
    ,SOVALUE
    ,USAGE
    ,CALCODE
    ,PCTDESC
    ,REVDATE
FROM 
    ACCOUNT 
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT 
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,EMAIL
    ,FundSourceName
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Inv_Narrative
    ,PostCode
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,CQUIN
    ,CQUIN_REF
    ,CQUIN_TYPE
    ,EDICONTACT
    ,PAYDAYS
    ,PAYDAYSDOM
    ,PAYDAYSDOMDESC
    ,PAYMONTH
    ,PAYMONTHDESC
FROM 
    dbo.FSCONTACTS
WHERE
    GRGApp_GrGsRef IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

properties.description: Extracts data Yardi require to csv files for a single home

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    AmendDateTime,
    CreateDateTime,
    HOME_REF,
    OLOC_REF,
    OROOM_REF,
    ROOM_CAT,
    ROOM_CAT_DESC,
    ROOM_CODE,
    ROOM_DESC,
    ROOM_NO_BEDS,
    ROOM_REF,
    ROOM_TYPE,
    ROOM_TYPE_DESC,
    CHARGEPERIOD,
    CURRENTRATE,
    RATEDATE,
    ROOM_UDF1,
    ROOM_UDF2,
    ROOM_UDF3,
    ROOM_UDF4,
    USEFLAG
FROM 
    dbo.ROOMS
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'
SELECT TOP 1 HomeName FROM Avery.HOME WHERE ColdHarbourHOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
    ,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN CHARINDEX(' and ', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME LIKE ' %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN LTRIM(RES_FNAME)
        WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) LIKE '% %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(LTRIM(RES_FNAME), 1, CHARINDEX(' ', LTRIM(RES_FNAME) + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,CASE 
        WHEN LTRIM(RES_SNAME) = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
        ELSE LTRIM(RES_SNAME)
    END AS RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,CASE 
        WHEN Forenames = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN Forenames = '*' THEN ''
        else Forenames
    END AS Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,CASE 
        WHEN Surname = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN Surname = '*' THEN ''
        else Surname
    END AS Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}')

SELECT 
    ACTDEATHDT
    ,ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,AD_REF
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CAUSE
    ,CAUSEDEATH
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DATE
    ,DISCHDECEAS
    ,DISDEST
    ,DISREASON
    ,DISTYPE
    ,DOCTOR
    ,FINALDISCH
    ,HOME_REF
    ,INITIALADM
    ,INOUT
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MOVE_REF
    ,PLACE
    ,REASON
    ,RES_REF
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,TIME
    ,MOVE_TIME
    ,ANALCHANGE
    ,COMPOSITE
    ,MOVESUB_REF
    ,PREVDISDEST
    ,PREVDISTYPE
FROM 
    dbo.ADMIN_DISCHARGE
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

SELECT
    ACCNO
    ,ACCSUFFIX
    ,ACCTYPE
    ,ACCTYPE2
    ,ACCTYPE_DECODE
    ,ACC_REF
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CALENDAR
    ,CAL_REF
    ,CHGPER
    ,Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Cont_Ref
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DAILYRATE
    ,ENDDATE
    ,FINALINV
    ,FS_REF
    ,FUNDSOURCE
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTRATEDT
    ,ORIGREF
    ,PENSBOOK
    ,PROFILE
    ,RATE
    ,RECGRP
    ,RECGRPDESC
    ,RELACCREF
    ,RES_REF
    ,RecType
    ,STARTDATE
    ,SUFFIXSUPERCEDED
    ,ANAL3
    ,ATTENTION
    ,AUTHORISED
    ,CONSULTANT
    ,CRCONTROL
    ,DEBTORCODE
    ,FUNDREQEDI
    ,FURC_DEC
    ,INPFUNDAPR
    ,LOCALITY
    ,NURFUNDAPR
    ,RECONCILED
    ,BANKACC
    ,BANKACCNAME
    ,BANKADDRESS1
    ,BANKADDRESS2
    ,BANKADDRESS3
    ,BANKADDRESS4
    ,BANKNAME
    ,BANKPOSTCODE
    ,BANKSORTCODE
    ,BANKSTREF
    ,BANKTRTYPE
    ,DDMANDREF
    ,SOCOLDAY
    ,SOCOLLECT
    ,SOVALUE
    ,USAGE
    ,CALCODE
    ,PCTDESC
    ,REVDATE
FROM 
    ACCOUNT 
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

SELECT 
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,EMAIL
    ,FundSourceName
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Inv_Narrative
    ,PostCode
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,CQUIN
    ,CQUIN_REF
    ,CQUIN_TYPE
    ,EDICONTACT
    ,PAYDAYS
    ,PAYDAYSDOM
    ,PAYDAYSDOMDESC
    ,PAYMONTH
    ,PAYMONTHDESC
FROM 
    dbo.FSCONTACTS
WHERE
    GRGApp_GrGsRef = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 'XRR227' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XRR227.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XRR227.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL

			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XJWT14' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XJWT14.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XJWT14.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XMR122' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XMR122.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XMR122.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'WTRB11' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM WTRB11.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            WTRB11.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XZWT15' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XZWT15.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XZWT15.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XNR123' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XNR123.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XNR123.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XVWT16' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XVWT16.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XVWT16.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate

activities.name: Company List
activities.description: Sets an array to contain the list of companies required for exporting

activities.name: List ID
activities.description: Converts the company IDs in the array to a list variable to be used in the SQL Query Source in Export Vendors

properties.description: Scheduled to trigger once at 10:15pm, Everyday
